register.reg_condition: when EL1 is capable of using AArch32

purpose_text.para: Provides a lock for the debug registers. The OS Lock also disables some debug exceptions and debug events.

configuration_text.para: The OS Lock can also be locked or unlocked using the AArch64 System register OSLAR_EL1 and External register OSLAR_EL1.

field_description.para: OS Lock Access. Writing the value 0xC5ACCE55 to the DBGOSLAR sets the OS Lock to 1. Writing any other value sets the OS Lock to 0.
Use DBGOSLSR.OSLK to check the current status of the lock.
